title: Impulsive Inspector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone to investigate each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you investigate someone, you will attack them. If they die and their role isn't hidden, you will learn their role.
- If their role is hidden, you will learn that their role was hidden.
- If they don't die, you will learn that they survived.

desc:
Post 3184
*I get the info. One way or another.*
Basic/None
